title: Music of the Forest - Orchestral Music Pack
description: Discover magical and wondrous forest realms, ranging from cheerful & wholesome to spooky & mysterious.
longDescription:
Music of the Forest - Orchestral Music Pack


Music of the Forest (MotF) is an excellent addition to any fantasy/action-RPG/adventure game. The music makes use of a variety of instruments ranging from orchestral to folk/medieval. Capturing many woodland moods, the music transports listeners to mysterious and mystical moments, bustling forest towns, and exciting calls to adventure. 


Pack Preview:

https://youtu.be/uaxQwN13pbY

Full Tracks:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9r49Yc8QkamcKot_-sz8p4XyvkqdIyZz


The pack is organized into 3 main folders:

  • "Full Tracks" contains the original 10 recordings in their entirety
  • "Loops" contains seamlessly loopable versions with full instrumentation & minimal alterations
  • "Alt Loops" contains stripped down versions of each track with reduced instrumentation & main melodies removed, for a lower profile loop


30 tracks, derived from 10 compositions, totaling ~57 minutes of music

Track List:

  1. Curiosities (Full Track)
  2. Curiosities (Loop)
  3. Curiosities - Alt (Loop)
  4. Elder Roots (Full Track)
  5. Elder Roots (Loop)
  6. Elder Roots - Alt (Loop)
  7. Fallen Leaves (Full Track)
  8. Fallen Leaves (Loop)
  9. Fallen Leaves - Alt (Loop)
  10. Little Forest Town (Full Track)
  11. Little Forest Town (Loop)
  12. Little Forest Town - Alt (Loop)
  13. Lost (Full Track)
  14. Lost (Loop)
  15. Lost - Alt (Loop)
  16. Our Journey Begins (Full Track)
  17. Our Journey Begins (Loop)
  18. Our Journey Begins - Alt (Loop)
  19. Rallying Song (Full Track)
  20. Rallying Song (Loop)
  21. Rallying Song - Alt (Loop)
  22. Sunbeams (Full Track)
  23. Sunbeams (Loop)
  24. Sunbeams - Alt (Loop)
  25. The Wood Nymph (Full Track)
  26. The Wood Nymph (Loop)
  27. The Wood Nymph - Alt (Loop)
  28. Wandering Trail (Full Track)
  29. Wandering Trail (Loop)
  30. Wandering Trail - Alt (Loop)


Music Quality:

Music of the Forest was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.


Technical Details:

30 Stereo WAV music tracks (24-bit/44.1kHz)

820MB compressed

862MB uncompressed

56 minutes and 57 seconds of music

20 looping tracks

10 non-looping tracks

Royalty-Free License


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit andrewchamberscomposer.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  20 seamlessly looping tracks
  •  10 non-looping tracks


Number of Audio Wavs: 30

Number of Audio Cues: 30

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 2116 kbps

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 56m57s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: A readme file has been included detailing the content of the pack
